text: Gary Jules (born March 19, 1969) is an American singer-songwriter. He is best known for his cover of the Tears for Fears song, "Mad World" that was used in the movie, Donnie Darko. == Discography == * 1998 - Greetings from the Side * 2001 - Trading Snakeoil for Wolftickets U.S. #144Billboard, Allmusic * 2006 - Gary Jules * 2008 - Bird ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:American rock guitarists Category:American rock singers Category:Singer-songwriters from California Category:Musicians from San Diego Category:Singers from San Diego Category:Writers from San Diego Category:Musicians from Fresno, California Category:Singers from Fresno, California Category:Writers from Fresno, California Category:American folk singers
title: Gary Jules
